name: Clint's Goldberg Machine
description:
Overview: 

Clint’s Goldberg machine is 3d physics-based game. Players in first person view control a free from camera to build a bridge using limited number of a blocks. Players can use the blocks in any order or rotation. 

Goal:

The goal of the player is to build a bridge using the number of blocks available in order to make the ball reach the pocket within given number of retries.

Controls: 
  • Left Click - Place Block
  • Right Click + A/D – Tilt Block
  • WASD – Move Camera
  • Q/E – Camera up/Down
  • Shift – Delete Mode
  • Enter – Toggle Simulate
